posts.author: Diana Holland and Ashley Sullins
posts.title: Grace Hopper: First Female Computer Programmer
posts.content: Ever wonder who came up with the term bug for when software doesn't work the way it was intended? The term was coined by Grace Hopper, one of the first female engineers in the industry.
